title: To Chapultepec = A Chapultepec
creator_contributor_role: Holt, Rinehart and Winston, production company
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Mexico - Social life and customs
Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Language and languages - Study and teaching
Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Language experience approach in education
description: This film provides some cultural background to Mexico, especially Chapultepec to students learning elementary Spanish with the text "Entender Y Hablar". This is a spanish language film that includes new words which describe what four young people do in the city for fun. Suitable for lower and middle secondary levels.
